prodNameC: 羅氏免疫分析弓漿蟲免疫球蛋白 M 抗體檢驗試劑
ingredientsDesc:
Elecsys Toxo IgM
M  Streptavidin-coated microparticles (transparent cap), 1 bottle, 6.5 mL: Streptavidin-coated microparticles, 0.72 mg/mL; preservative. 
R1  Toxoplasma-Ag~Ru(bpy) 2+3(gray cap), 1 bottle, 9 mL: Toxoplasma-antigen labeled with ruthenium complex＞1 mg/L; MES buffer 50 mmol/L, 
pH 6.0; preservative.
R2  Anti-h-IgM-Ab~biotin (black cap), bottle, 9 mL: Biotinylated monoclonal anti-h-IgM antibody (mouse)＞500 μg/L;HEPES buffer 50 mmol/L, pH 7.2; preservative.
Cal1 Negative calibrator 1 (white cap), 2 bottles of 0.67 mL each: Human serum, negative for anti-Toxo IgM; preservative.
Cal2 Positive calibrator 2 (black cap), 2 bottles of 0.67 mL each: Anti-Toxo IgM (human) approx. 130 U/mL (Roche units) in human serum; preservative.

Elecsys PreciControl Toxo IgM
？PC TOXIGM1: 8 bottles, each containing 0.67 mL of control serum Human serum, negative for Toxo IgM antibodies; preservative.
？PC TOXIGM2: 8 bottles, each containing 0.67 mL of control serum Human serum, positive for anti-Toxo IgM
 antibodies approx. 125 U/mL (randomly selected Roche units); preservative.
applicantName: 台灣羅氏醫療診斷設備股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 台北市中山區民權東路3段2號10樓
efficacy:
本產品(規格：04618858190)適用於MODULAR ANALYTICS E170、cobas e 411、cobas e 601、cobas e 602機型，在體外以免疫分析法定性檢測人類血清和血漿中弓漿蟲(Toxoplasma gondii)的IgM抗體。
本產品(規格：07028024190)適用於cobas e 801機型，在體外以免疫分析法定性檢測人類血清和血漿中弓漿蟲(Toxoplasma gondii)的IgM抗體。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: A 臨床化學及臨床毒理學
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: A.1660 品管材料(分析與非分析)

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: C.3780 嚙齒動物弓漿蟲血清試劑
